title: Pixel 3 phone app issues
content:
Sometimes, when I use the Phone app to make a call, it will show the calling screen but actually won't make a call. Only after I end the call and redial does the phone app actually make a phone call.

I don't know if this is something to do with my Pixel 3, or if it's a common Pixel 3 problem, or if it's an Android related issue. 

Any suggestions would be helpful.
Thanks.
